Title: Requires the commissioner of motor vehicles to create a bicycle with electric assist battery swapping pilot program in a city with a population of one million or more
Summary: Requires the commissioner of motor vehicles to create a bicycle with electric assist battery swapping pilot program in a city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Add ยง1244, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of motor vehicles to create a bicycle with electric assist battery swapping pilot program in a city with a population of one million or more
